item.description:
So for years I have been hunting for an annual Christmas tree burn in New Hampshire that I heard about in 2003.  Never give up... I just found one in Salem, MA.

Salem's 10th Annual Christmas Tree Bonfire:

Friday, Jan. 4th - Dead Horse Beach at Salem Willows - 6:30 p.m.
(Rain/Snow/Wind Reschedule Date: Saturday, Jan. 5th)
(check www.salem.com for rescheduling information)

Free Hot Chocolate & Music

Bring your Christmas tree with you that evening, drop it off at the beach after January 2nd or leave it out for curbside pickup beginning January 2nd.  Please remove all decorations and lights from your tree.

Sponsored by the City of Salem, Salem Park, Recreation & Community Services Department & The Gathering

http://salem.patch.com/articles/annual-christmas-tree-burning-next-week

 

This should be a very fun event - a winter bonfire on the beach.

 

We may need an assistant host so if you're willing please let me know.

 

David
item.how_to_find_us: We will text you instructions - be sure to send your cell # when you sign up. We will NOT be saving these numbers.

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Burn the trees! Annual Christmas tree burning event...
